Application Date: 1. Application Date: Date you applied (YYYY-MM-DD format)
3. Role Title: Exact job title from posting
5. Source: Where you found it (LinkedIn, Perplexity Comet, Company Website, Referral, etc.)
6. Status: Applied, Researching, Phone Screen, Interview Scheduled, Interviewed, Offer Received, Rejected, Withdrawn
7. Match Score: 0-100 based on your assessment
8. Salary Range: Expected or posted salary
10. Application Method: Easy Apply, Direct Apply, Referral, etc.
11. Next Steps: What you need to do next
12. Follow-up Date: When to follow up
15. LinkedIn URL: Link to job posting
16. Company Stage: Startup Series A/B/C, Consulting, Corporate, Hospital Chain
17. Decision: Pending, Offer Accepted, Offer Rejected
